ComicInfo.Title: Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: The Infestation threat has broken the boundaries of time and the Lovecraftian monsters invade the world of Transformers: Hearts of Steel! It's a steam-punk world in the grips of panic as terrifying beings from the depths of the ocean corrupt both humans and Decepticons! Only one man knows how to stop the Infestation, and it's up to him to awaken the Autobots in time to prevent full-scale cataclysm!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:20:17. [CVDB313903]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Guido Guidi, Joana Lafuente, Livio Ramondelli
ComicInfo.Characters: Blitzwing, Bonecrusher, Bumblebee, Dirge, H.P. Lovecraft, Hound, Ironhide, Kitty Merriweather , Nautilator, Nikola Tesla, Optimus Prime, Overbite, Ratchet, Shockwave, Skalor, Snaptrap, Tentakil, Thomas Alva Edison, Tobias Muldoon , Trailcutter, Wheeljack
ComicInfo.Teams: Autobots, Decepticons, Great Old Ones, Seacons
ComicInfo.Locations: Atlantic Ocean, New York City, Nova Scotia, San Francisco
